rows.arabic: حمٓ
rows.translation: HA MIM.

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, most benevolent, ever-merciful.

rows.arabic: وَٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ٱلْمُبِينِ
rows.translation: The perspicuous Book is witness

rows.arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةٍ مُّبَـٰرَكَةٍ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ
rows.translation: (That) We sent it down one night of blessing -- so that We could warn --
rows.transliteration: innā anzalnāhu fī laylatim mubārakah ۚ innā kunnā mundhirīn

rows.arabic: فِيهَا يُفْرَقُ كُلُّ أَمْرٍ حَكِيمٍ
rows.translation: On which all affairs are sorted out and decided

rows.arabic: أَمْرًا مِّنْ عِندِنَآ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرْسِلِينَ
rows.translation: As commands from Us. It is indeed We who send (messengers),

rows.arabic: رَحْمَةً مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
rows.translation: A mercy from your Lord. Verily He is all-hearing and all-knowing,
rows.transliteration: raḥmatan min rabbik ۚ innahu huwas samī`ul `alīm

rows.arabic: رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
rows.translation: The Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them, if you really do believe.
rows.transliteration: rabbis samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā baynahumā ۖ in kuntum mūqinīn

rows.arabic: لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ ۖ رَبُّكُمْ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
rows.translation: There is no god other than He, who gives you life and death, your Lord and the Lord of your fathers of old.
rows.transliteration: lā ilāha illā huwa yuḥyī wayumīt ۖ rabbukum warabbu ābā-ikumul-awwalīn

rows.arabic: بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّ يَلْعَبُونَ
rows.translation: Yet they are lost in doubt and play.

rows.arabic: فَٱرْتَقِبْ يَوْمَ تَأْتِى ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِدُخَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
rows.translation: So watch for the day when the sky begins to emit clear smoke,
rows.transliteration: fartaqib yawma ta-tis samā-u bidukhānin mubīn

rows.arabic: يَغْشَى ٱلنَّاسَ ۖ هَـٰذَا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
rows.translation: Which would envelope mankind. That would be a grievous affliction.

rows.arabic: رَّبَّنَا ٱكْشِفْ عَنَّا ٱلْعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤْمِنُونَ
rows.translation: "O Lord, take away this torment from us," (they will pray); "we have come to believe."

rows.arabic: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ وَقَدْ جَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ مُّبِينٌ
rows.translation: How can a warning benefit them? The Apostle who explained all things clearly had come to them,
rows.transliteration: annā lahumudh dhikrā waqad jā-ahum rasūlun mubīn

rows.arabic: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوْا۟ عَنْهُ وَقَالُوا۟ مُعَلَّمٌ مَّجْنُونٌ
rows.translation: But they turned away from him, and said: "He is well-instructed, (but) possessed."

rows.arabic: إِنَّا كَاشِفُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابِ قَلِيلًا ۚ إِنَّكُمْ عَآئِدُونَ
rows.translation: If We remove the torment a little, you revert back (to misdeeds).

rows.arabic: يَوْمَ نَبْطِشُ ٱلْبَطْشَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ
rows.translation: The day that We shall seize them with a grievous hold, We will indeed castigate them.
rows.transliteration: yawma nabṭishul baṭshatal kubrā innā muntaqimūn

rows.arabic: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَجَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ كَرِيمٌ
rows.translation: We had tried the people of Pharaoh before them. A respected prophet had come to them (saying):
rows.transliteration: walaqad fatannā qablahum qawma fir`awna wajā-ahum rasūlun karīm

rows.arabic: أَنْ أَدُّوٓا۟ إِلَىَّ عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
rows.translation: "Deliver the creatures of God to me. I am the trusted messenger sent to you.
rows.transliteration: an addū ilayya `ibādallāh ۖ innī lakum rasūlun amīn

rows.arabic: وَأَن لَّا تَعْلُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّىٓ ءَاتِيكُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
rows.translation: Do not think yourselves to be above God: I have come to you with clear authority.
rows.transliteration: wa-an lā ta`lū `alallāh ۖ innī ātīkum bisulṭānin mubīn

rows.arabic: وَإِنِّى عُذْتُ بِرَبِّى وَرَبِّكُمْ أَن تَرْجُمُونِ
rows.translation: I have taken refuge in my Lord and your Lord against your stoning me to death.
rows.transliteration: wa innī `udhtu birabbī warabbikum an tarjumūn

rows.arabic: وَإِن لَّمْ تُؤْمِنُوا۟ لِى فَٱعْتَزِلُونِ
rows.translation: If you do not believe in me, leave me alone."
rows.transliteration: wa in lam tu-minū lī fa`tazilūn

rows.arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوْمٌ مُّجْرِمُونَ
rows.translation: Then he called to his Lord: "These are a sinful people."
rows.transliteration: fada`ā rabbahu anna hā-ulā-i qawmun mujrimūn

rows.arabic: فَأَسْرِ بِعِبَادِى لَيْلًا إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
rows.translation: "Journey by night with My devotees," (it was said); "you will certainly be pursued.

rows.arabic: وَٱتْرُكِ ٱلْبَحْرَ رَهْوًا ۖ إِنَّهُمْ جُندٌ مُّغْرَقُونَ
rows.translation: (Cross and) leave the sea undisturbed. The (pursuing) hosts will surely be drowned,"
rows.transliteration: wātrukil baḥra rahwā ۖ innahum jundun mughraqūn

rows.arabic: كَمْ تَرَكُوا۟ مِن جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
rows.translation: How many gardens and fountains did they leave behind,

rows.arabic: وَزُرُوعٍ وَمَقَامٍ كَرِيمٍ
rows.translation: And fields and stately mansions,

rows.arabic: وَنَعْمَةٍ كَانُوا۟ فِيهَا فَـٰكِهِينَ
rows.translation: And the comfort they enjoyed.

rows.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَأَوْرَثْنَـٰهَا قَوْمًا ءَاخَرِينَ
rows.translation: Thus it was; and We passed them on to another people.

rows.arabic: فَمَا بَكَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنظَرِينَ
rows.translation: Neither did the heavens weep for them, nor the earth, nor were they granted respite.
rows.transliteration: famā bakat `alayhimus samā-u wal-arḍu wa mā kānū munẓarīn

rows.arabic: وَلَقَدْ نَجَّيْنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ مِنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْمُهِينِ
rows.translation: So We saved the children of Israel from degrading suffering
rows.transliteration: walaqad najjaynā banī isrā-iyla minal `adhābil muhīn

rows.arabic: مِن فِرْعَوْنَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيًا مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ
rows.translation: They (had experienced) under the Pharaoh. He was certainly a tyrant, guilty of excess.
rows.transliteration: min fir`awn ۚ innahu kāna `āliyan minal musrifīn

rows.arabic: وَلَقَدِ ٱخْتَرْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍ عَلَى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
rows.translation: And We exalted them over the other people knowingly,

rows.arabic: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَـٰٓؤٌا۟ مُّبِينٌ
rows.translation: And sent them tokens to bring out the best in them.
rows.transliteration: wa-ātaynāhum minal-āyāti mā fīhi balā-un mubīn

rows.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَيَقُولُونَ
rows.translation: Even then they say:

rows.arabic: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا مَوْتَتُنَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ
rows.translation: "There is no dying for us but once; and we shall not be raised again.
rows.transliteration: in hiya illā mawtatunal-ūlā wa mā naḥnu bimunsharīn

rows.arabic: فَأْتُوا۟ بِـَٔابَآئِنَآ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
rows.translation: So bring our ancestors back, if you are truthful."

rows.arabic: أَهُمْ خَيْرٌ أَمْ قَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ مُجْرِمِينَ
rows.translation: Are they better than the people of Tubba, and those who had lived before them, whom We destroyed as they were sinners?
rows.transliteration: ahum khayrun am qawmu tubba`in wal ladhīna min qablihim ۚ ahlaknāhum ۖ innahum kānū mujrimīn

rows.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا لَـٰعِبِينَ
rows.translation: We have not created the heavens and the earth and all that lies between them, out of play.
rows.transliteration: wa mā khalaqnas samāwāti wal-arḍa wa mā baynahumā lā`ibīn

rows.arabic: مَا خَلَقْنَـٰهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
rows.translation: We created them with definite purpose; but most of them do not understand.
rows.transliteration: mā khalaqnāhumā illā bil ḥaqqi walākinna aktharahum lā ya`lamūn

rows.arabic: إِنَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْفَصْلِ مِيقَـٰتُهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
rows.translation: The Day of Judgement is your promised day of meeting,

rows.arabic: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى مَوْلًى عَن مَّوْلًى شَيْـًٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
rows.translation: The day when friend will help no friend in the least, nor will they be helped,
rows.transliteration: yawma lā yughnī mawlan `an mawlan shay-an walā hum yunṣarūn

rows.arabic: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
rows.translation: Apart from those to whom God is kind. He is all-mighty and all-merciful.
rows.transliteration: illā man raḥimallāh ۚ innahu huwal `azīzur raḥīm

rows.arabic: إِنَّ شَجَرَتَ ٱلزَّقُّومِ
rows.translation: The tree of Zaqqum will indeed be

rows.arabic: طَعَامُ ٱلْأَثِيمِ
rows.translation: The food of sinners.

rows.arabic: كَٱلْمُهْلِ يَغْلِى فِى ٱلْبُطُونِ
rows.translation: It is like pitch. It will fume in the belly

rows.arabic: كَغَلْىِ ٱلْحَمِيمِ
rows.translation: As does boiling water.

rows.arabic: خُذُوهُ فَٱعْتِلُوهُ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
rows.translation: "Seize him and drag him into the depths of Hell," (it will be said),

rows.arabic: ثُمَّ صُبُّوا۟ فَوْقَ رَأْسِهِۦ مِنْ عَذَابِ ٱلْحَمِيمِ
rows.translation: "Then pour over his head the torment of scalding water."
rows.transliteration: thumma ṣubbū fawqa ra-sihi min `adhābil ḥamīm

rows.arabic: ذُقْ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْكَرِيمُ
rows.translation: "Taste it," (they will be told). "You were indeed the mighty and noble!

rows.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَمْتَرُونَ
rows.translation: This is certainly what you had denied."
rows.transliteration: inna hādhā mā kuntum bihi tamtarūn

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى مَقَامٍ أَمِينٍ
rows.translation: Surely those who fear and follow the straight path will be in a place of peace and security

rows.arabic: فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
rows.translation: In the midst of gardens and of springs,

rows.arabic: يَلْبَسُونَ مِن سُندُسٍ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٍ مُّتَقَـٰبِلِينَ
rows.translation: Dressed in brocade and shot silk, facing one another.
rows.transliteration: yalbasūna min sundusin wa istabraqin mutaqābilīn

rows.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
rows.translation: Just like that. We shall pair them with companions with large black eyes.

rows.arabic: يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِكُلِّ فَـٰكِهَةٍ ءَامِنِينَ
rows.translation: They will call for every kind of fruit with satisfaction.

rows.arabic: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا ٱلْمَوْتَ إِلَّا ٱلْمَوْتَةَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ ۖ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
rows.translation: There they will not know any death apart from the first death they had died, and will be kept safe from the torment of Hell
rows.transliteration: lā yadhūqūna fīhal mawta illal-mawtatal-ūlā ۖ wawaqāhum `adhābal jaḥīm

rows.arabic: فَضْلًا مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
rows.translation: By the beneficence of your Lord. This will be the great success.
rows.transliteration: faḍlan min rabbik ۚ dhālika huwal fawzul `aẓīm

rows.arabic: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرْنَـٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
rows.translation: Therefore We have made this (Qur'an) easy in your tongue. They may haply take a warning.

rows.arabic: فَٱرْتَقِبْ إِنَّهُم مُّرْتَقِبُونَ
rows.translation: So you wait. They are also waiting.
